content.verses:
[
    [0] {
      order: 1
      type: verse
      hawaiian_text: 
      | Ma ke alahele ʻo Iesû
      | I hālāwai aku ai
      | Me ke kanaka ʻōpio hanohano
      | Kaulana i ka waiwai
      | Pane mai e ka ʻōpio
      | ʻE kuʻu Haku maikaʻi
      | He aha hoʻi kaʻu e hana aku ai
      | I loaʻa e ke ola mau?
      english_text: 
      | Along the road, Jesus
      | Met
      | With a distinguished young
      | man
      | Who was known for his
      | wealth
      | The young man said,
      | "My good lord,
      hawaiian_lines: [Ma ke alahele ʻo Iesû, I hālāwai aku ai, Me ke kanaka ʻōpio hanohano, Kaulana i ka waiwai, Pane mai e ka ʻōpio, ʻE kuʻu Haku maikaʻi, He aha hoʻi kaʻu e hana aku ai, I loaʻa e ke ola mau?]
      english_lines: [Along the road, Jesus, Met, With a distinguished young, man, Who was known for his, wealth, The young man said,, "My good lord,]
    }
    [1] {
      order: 2
      type: hui
      hawaiian_text: 
      | E hāʻawi, e hāʻawi lilo
      | I kou mau waiwai
      | Huli a hahai mai iaʻu
      | I loaʻa e ke ola mau ia ʻoe
      | Minamina e ka ʻōpio
      | I kona mau waiwai
      | I ke kūʻai a hāʻawi lilo aku
      | I ka poʻe nele a hune
      | Huli aʻe ʻo Iesū lā
      | Pane aku i ka ʻōpio
      | ʻAʻole aʻe hiki ke kanaka waiwai
      | I ke aupuni o ka lani
      english_text: 
      | Along the road, Jesus
      | Met
      | With a distinguished young
      | man
      | Who was known for his
      | wealth
      | The young man said,
      | "My good lord,
      | What must I do
      | To gain eternal life?"
      | Chorus:
      | "Give, give away all
      | Of your possessions
      hawaiian_lines: [E hāʻawi, e hāʻawi lilo, I kou mau waiwai, Huli a hahai mai iaʻu, I loaʻa e ke ola mau ia ʻoe, Minamina e ka ʻōpio, I kona mau waiwai, I ke kūʻai a hāʻawi lilo aku, I ka poʻe nele a hune, Huli aʻe ʻo Iesū lā, Pane aku i ka ʻōpio, ʻAʻole aʻe hiki ke kanaka waiwai, I ke aupuni o ka lani]
      english_lines: [Along the road, Jesus, Met, With a distinguished young, man, Who was known for his, wealth, The young man said,, "My good lord,, What must I do, To gain eternal life?", Chorus:, "Give, give away all, Of your possessions]
      label: Hui:
    }
  ]
